message: We had every console going. My father was just as interested in this new technology as we were. I'm artistic - was well able to entertain myself as a child - & had to be dragged in from climbing trees, when it was raining. I wouldn't say I turned out fantastic, but I'm alright. Was the same fear mongering not there when the T.V. first came along? Besides, kids have to be tech savvy these days, otherwise they will get left behind in the future & have less opportunities available to them. Learning to code is akin to learning a language.
Tell your governor not to except this bill

These foolish protesters block traffic.... and cause chaos.... so they can make a statement by holding signs that read: BLACK HEALTH MATTERS.... Have these fools lost their minds???? Don't they know that guy in the White House.... has given us ALL.... AFFORDABLE HEALTHCARE!!! LMAO!!!!! Oh yeah.... and main pont here... DR. MARTIN LUTHER KING JR... is rolling over in his grave.... THIS KIND OF FOOLISHNESS IS NOT ANY PART OF WHAT THAT GREAT MAN STOOD FOR AS FAR AS ADVANCING THE BLACK RACE!!!!
You have that bass ackwards., or ass backwards.... 4 out of 10 are for Trump...... 6 out of 10 think Trump is a Dick.....
Catrina Kure

Really it takes more faith to believe in the nonsense of evolution crap than to have faith in God. Woooo such big words with your mindless conclusions. And regarding """"the invisible space daddy"""" part of your brainless rant-we shall see how brave you really are someday when your miserable carcass stands in front of the God you so proudly and bravely mock and disbelieve in. Yes, we will see how well it works out for you. Really going to suck to be you some day but that's your choice. And no I could care less what you think nor will I come back to read any more of your uninspiring comments. Evolution is as illogical as much as it is impossible.
Tampa, Fl

Well that's the question, what does he just do? And that's all I was really trying to ask. You and I both watched Clinton and Trump speeches without media bias and simply came to different conclusions. You and I both, as well as plenty of other Americans, put in the research to lead us to choose who we voted for as president. I was hoping for more actually related to his business and Trump News than Clinton coming up again. Trump is the president elect so I was wondering about him. Maybe you assume I'm tugging at some strings or something, but I was just looking for more on the business aspect. Thanks though.
